scenes.visual_prompt: A photo of botspot.trade interface emerging from darkness, volumetric lighting illuminating a sleek modern dashboard, professional tech environment. Shot on Arri Alexa, Cooke S4 prime lens, f/2.8, cinematic lighting.
scenes.motion_prompt: Camera: Slow dolly push-in. Visual: botspot.trade dashboard coming to life. Style: Cinematic, premium.

scenes.visual_prompt: A photo of botspot.trade dashboard in full operation showing key features, golden hour lighting streaming through modern office window, professional workspace. Shot on Arri Alexa, Cooke S4 prime lens, f/2.8.
scenes.motion_prompt: Camera: Slow pan across screen. Visual: botspot.trade features revealed. Style: Cinematic, premium.

scenes.visual_prompt: A photo of botspot.trade logo prominently displayed with brand colors, premium lighting setup, sleek minimalist backdrop. Shot on Arri Alexa, Cooke S4 prime lens, f/2.8.
scenes.motion_prompt: Camera: Slow orbit settling on logo. Visual: botspot.trade brand reveal. Style: Cinematic, premium.

research_brief:
{
  "Product/Service Name": "BotSpot",
  "Core Value Proposition (USP)": "Empowers users to create, deploy, and profit from AI trading bots instantly and automatically, without requiring any coding knowledge.",
  "Target Audience": "Individuals interested in automated trading, beginners to intermediate traders, and those seeking to leverage AI for financial gain without programming expertise.",
  "Top 5 Key Features": [
    "Create AI Trading Agents in Seconds",
    "Deploy AI Trading Agents Instantly",
    "No Coding Required for Strategy Creation",
    "Automated Trading (bots trade for you)",
    "24/7 Trading Operation"
  ],
  "Brand Tone": "Innovative, Empowering, Efficient, Professional, Results-Oriented",
  "Industry": "FinTech (Financial Technology), Automated Trading, AI/Machine Learning",
  "Competitors Mentioned": "None",
  "One-Sentence Pitch": "BotSpot revolutionizes trading by enabling anyone to create and deploy profitable AI trading agents automatically in seconds, with no coding required, to trade 24/7."
}
